name: Derpy Dino
description:
Derpy Dino is a game where you play as a dinosaur. It's a 2D survival game, where you try to dodge falling meteors. Your goal in the game is to survive as long as possible. While you play you can see for how long you have survived by looking at the timer. If a meteor hits you, you die and you can try again. The game features a cartoony, colorful style and a unique soundtrack.

The game is only playable on keyboard/mouse.
